_source.text: After initial reactions, I'm not surprised, Ingham is more like Bruno and Chane-In some ways the open warfare approach is better because everyone can see, especially the fence sitters in CoE and forces the issue with those who still seem to be in a imaginary land where everything will just one day go away.
